      • createShader

        public static int createShader(int shaderType,
                               String shaderContent,
                               String filename)
                        throws GLException
        Load sources, compile and check a new shader
        Parameters:
        shaderType - GL_FRAGMENT, GL_VERTEX, GL_GEOMETRY, etc...
        shaderContent - shader content as a string
        filename - file containing the shader content. It can be null, it is used only to display the filename when an error occured
        Returns:
        Throws:
        GLException
